#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
#define all(A) A.begin(),A.end()
using vll = vector<ll>;
using vvll = vector<vll>;
#define rep(i, n) for (long long i = 0; i < (long long)(n); i++)
ll gcd(ll(a), ll(b)) {
    ll c = a;
    while (a % b != 0) {
        c = a % b;
        a = b;
        b = c;
    }
    return b;
}


int main() {
    string S;
    cin >> S;
    if (S == "") {
        cout << "No" << endl;
        return 0;
    }
    while (1) {
        if (S == "ABC") {
            cout << "Yes" << endl;
            return 0;
        }
        ll A = 0, B = 0, C = 0;
        rep(i, S.size()) {
            if (S[i] == 'A')A++;
            if (S[i] == 'B')B++;
            if (S[i] == 'C')C++;
        }
        string T = "";
        bool P = false;
        if (A <= B && A <= C) {
            rep(i, S.size()) {

                if (i < S.size() - 2) {
                    if (S[i] == 'A' && S[i + 1] == 'B' && S[i + 2] == 'C') {
                        T.push_back('A');
                        i += 2;
                        P = true;
                    }
                    else T.push_back(S[i]);
                }
                else T.push_back(S[i]);
            }
        }
        else if (B <= C) {
            rep(i, S.size()) {

                if (i < S.size() - 2) {
                    if (S[i] == 'A' && S[i + 1] == 'B' && S[i + 2] == 'C') {
                        T.push_back('B');
                        i += 2;
                        P = 1;
                    }
                    else T.push_back(S[i]);
                }
                else T.push_back(S[i]);
            }
        }
        else {
            rep(i, S.size()) {
                if (i < S.size() - 1) {
                    if (S[i] == 'A' && S[i + 1] == 'B' && S[i + 2] == 'C') {
                        T.push_back('C');
                        i += 2;
                        P = 1;
                    }
                    else T.push_back(S[i]);
                }
                else T.push_back(S[i]);
            }
        }
        S = T;
        if (!P) {
            cout << "No" << endl;
            return 0;
        }
    }


}
